name: RUFF
description:
RUFF
Genre: Puzzle

Plot: In a distant corner of the Not-Our Galaxy, the space battleship of the Great Empire
Attacks the space cruiser of the Proud Republic. Not equal forces
And soon Republicans must die heroically, but there is still hope.
One space bomber of the cruiser was able to break through to an enemy ship.
It is left to fly to the main reactor of the battleship,
Blow it up and become a hero (possibly posthumously).
However, there is a slight problem, the bomber has a plasma projectile
tore off the main engine...

Game mechanics: The player controls a space bomber,
Which moving through the level should get into the open portal trying at
It is to obtain minimal damage.
The portal opens with the selection of the bonus "Key."
The player receives damage from energy discharges and projectiles.
With the Repair bonus, you can restore the player 's health to the maximum.
Control is performed only by left mouse button (LMB).
When the LMB is pressed, the bomb is fired towards the sight.
Holding the LMB pressed leads to an increase in energy and growth
A protective field around the bomber.
The maximum size protective field blocks any damage.
When the LMB is released and the energy value is more than five units, the nose
Engine, at that space
The bomber throws away in the opposite direction from the sight.
The sight constantly revolves around the cosmic
Bomber and is not controlled by a player.

Control: left mouse button
Pressing - shot with a bomb,
Retention - increase of energy and protective field,
Release - movement, at high energy value.
